Name: Paradise Passion Martini
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Wash and cut passion fruit in half, SCOOP out the seeds and flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Thick, almost syrupy. Rich and fruity.
History: A passion fruit fruity riff on the classic Paradise cocktail .
